description: This file defines the main index route component for a note management web application built with Qwik. It manages state for categories, notes, search, and selection, and renders UI elements such as category list, notes list, and note editor, including interactions like creating, deleting, and updating notes.

methods.name: selectCategory$
methods.description: Handles category selection, filtering notes based on selected category and search query.

methods.name: selectNote$
methods.description: Sets the active note by its ID.

methods.name: updateSearch$
methods.description: Updates search query and filters notes accordingly.

methods.name: createNote$
methods.description: Creates a new blank note in the current category.

methods.name: saveNote$
methods.description: Updates the current active note with provided changes.

methods.name: moveToCategory$
methods.description: Moves the active note to another category or unassigned.
